name: Intelligence Network
perks: Getting the chosen result on at least one resolution grants 10 Landsraad Standing every Council
+100% Agent recruitment speed

+1 Agent slot in Counterintelligence

childs.name: Landsraad Support
perks: +50 max Influence per Agent assigned to a Landsraad Information slot
+1 Agent slot in Landsraad Information

childs.name: Political Art

childs.name: Stealth Gear
perks: 20% of an operation's Intel cost is refund when launched in the territory of a faction in Conflict
